#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,i,price;
	char s[201];
	cin>>t;
    while(t--)
	{
		price=0;
		int count[123]={0};
		cin>>s;
		i=0;
		while(s[i]!='\0')
		{
			if(count[s[i]]==1)
			{
				count[s[i]]=0;
			}
			else
			{
				count[s[i]]=1;
				price++;
			}
			i++;
		}
		cout<<price<<endl;
	}
	
	
	return 0;

}
